description: append lins text_standard. Next use secrets to use API Keys more securely Missing values Here I have used a viz module called missingno https pypi. Data train. append flr flesch_kg. Score Notes 90 100 very easy to read easily understood by an average 11 year old student 80 90 easy to read 70 80 fairly easy to read 60 70 easily understood by 13 to 15 year old students 50 60 fairly difficult to read 30 50 difficult to read best understood by college graduates 0 30 very difficult to read best understood by university graduates Logging a custom histogram for the distribution of Flesch Reading Ease scores More than 70 of excerpts can be easily understood by 13 15 year olds. Introduction Goal To build algorithms to rate the complexity of reading passages for grade 3 12 classroom use. csv the training and testing set id unique ID for excerpt url_legal URL of source license license of source material excerpt text to predict reading ease of target reading ease standard_error measure of spread of scores among multiple raters for each excerpt Note url_legal license and standard error are blank in the test set. append cole linsear. excerpt target and standard_error Pre processing excerpt It s important to preprocess the excerpt before we proceed further Logging the preprocessed dataset as an artifact Using the saved artifact EDA Logging custom histograms for target and standard error distribution Logging a dictionary of custom objects Logging a custom bar chart for license distribution Logging custom bar charts for unigrams bigrams and trigrams sentence_count and target are very highly correlated since extremely long sentences can be complex to read and understand. to_csv train_excerpt_preprocessed. append ar coleman. Evaluation metric Root Mean Squared Error RMSE RMSE sqrt frac 1 n Sigma_ i 1 n Big frac y_i hat y_i sigma_i Big 2 where y_i original value hat y_i predicted value n number of rows in the test data Import libraries I will be integrating W B for visualizations and logging artifacts CommonLit Project on W B Dashboard https wandb. append flkg fog_scale. org wiki Automated_readability_index coleman The Coleman Liau Index https en. Artifact train_excerpt_preprocessed type dataset artifact. init project commonlit name text_props_readability artifact wandb. add_file text_props_readability. to_csv test_excerpt_preprocessed. edu grishman jet guide PennPOS. org project textstat is a library used to calculate statistics from text. ai ruchi798 commonlit workspace user ruchi798 Illustrations tools Canva https www. gunning_fog train_df excerpt i ar textstat. flesch_reading_ease train_df excerpt i flkg textstat. flesch_kincaid_grade train_df excerpt i fs textstat. org wiki Coleman E2 80 93Liau_index linsear Linsear Write Formula https en. add_file test_excerpt_preprocessed. org project missingno to visualize missing values in the training set. html Logging a custom bar chart for POS distribution Readability tests textstat https pypi. It came in super handy for calculating scores of various readability tests flesch_re The Flesch Reading Ease formula https en. finish Function to plot wandb bar chart Function to plot wandb histogram maximum target minimum target maximum standard error minimum standard error color function for the wordcloud flesch_re flesch_kg fog_scale automated_r coleman linsear text_standard for i in range 7 for i in range len text_props flr textstat. Artifact text_props_readability type dataset artifact. Let s see which excerpts have the highest and lowest Target and Flesch Reading Ease Score Baseline model Submission file Here s a snapshot of my project https wandb. ai ruchi798 commonlit workspace user ruchi798 To get the API key an account is to be created on the website https wandb. Artifact test_excerpt_preprocessed type dataset artifact. text_standard train_df excerpt i flesch_re. org wiki Linsear_Write text_standard Readability Consensus based upon all the above testsLogging the text properties dataset as an artifact This helps me to save on time since I can directly use the saved artifact for my workflow A snapshot of the newly created artifacts Since I have already logged the artifact I can directly use it in this manner There is a strong correlation between our target variable and the Flesch Readability Ease test values. log_artifact artifact run. automated_readability_index train_df excerpt i cole textstat. to_csv text_props_readability. linsear_write_formula train_df excerpt i ts textstat. add_file train_excerpt_preprocessed. Let s explore the distribution of test values for Flesch Readability Ease. We don t have any missing values in the columns of our interest i. com Preprocessing function find alphabets convert to lower case tokenize words remove stopwords lemmatization train_df excerpt_preprocessed preprocess train_df test_df excerpt_preprocessed preprocess test_df train_df. init project commonlit name excerpt_preprocessed artifact wandb. csv run wandb. coleman_liau_index train_df excerpt i lins textstat. org wiki Flesch E2 80 93Kincaid_readability_tests Flesch_reading_ease fog_scale The Fog Scale Gunning FOG Formula https en. append ts text_props flesch_re flesch_re text_props flesch_kg flesch_kg text_props fog_scale fog_scale text_props automated_r automated_r text_props coleman coleman text_props linsear linsear text_props text_standard text_standard text_props.
